atlantis.engine.graphics3d

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.engine.graphics3d.Renderer

  • public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
    The graphics device. It's responsible to draw 3D object on screen.
    Author:
    Yannick

    • Constructor Detail

      • Renderer

        public Renderer(int width,
        int height)
        Create a software renderer. The front and back buffer have the same size. The auto clear flags is disable so you must call clear method before each draw.
        Parameters:
        width - Desired width.
        height - Desired height.

      • Renderer

        public Renderer(int screenWidth,
        int screenHeight,
        int backBufferWidth,
        int backBufferHeight,
        boolean autoClear)
        Create a software renderer.
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - Screen width.
        screenHeight - Screen height.
        backBufferWidth - Back buffer width.
        backBufferHeight - Back buffer height.
        autoClear - Enable or disable auto clear.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear(java.awt.Color color)
        Clear the screen with a specified color and reset the depth buffer.
        Parameters:
        color - Desired color to clear the screen.

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics graphics,
          Camera camera,
          Mesh[] meshes)
        Render a scene to the screen.
        Parameters:
        graphics - The graphics context.
        camera - The active camera to use.
        meshes - A collection of meshes. // TODO will be a scene object later.

      • getFrontBuffer

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getFrontBuffer()
        Gets the front buffer used by the renderer.
        Returns:
        Return the buffered image used for front buffer.

      • setAutoClear

        public void setAutoClear(boolean autoClear)
        Enable or disable auto clear before each draw.
        Parameters:
        autoClear - Sets to true to enable auto clear.

      • isAutoClear

        public boolean isAutoClear()

      • setAutoClearColor

        public void setAutoClearColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Sets the color used to auto clear the screen.

      • getAutoClearColor

        public java.awt.Color getAutoClearColor()
        Gets the color used to auto clear the screen.
        Returns:
        Return the color used to clear the screen.
